content.query:
--CREATE DATABASE nyctaxi
--GO

USE nyctaxi;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE mysample
WITH (    LOCATION   = 'https://sasampledata.dfs.core.windows.net/nyctaxi/source/trip_fare'
)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT textdelimited  
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,  
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', 
        FIRST_ROW = 1, 
        USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = True
          )
)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA nyc
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE nyc.tripfare (medallion varchar(100),
	hack_license varchar(100),
    vendor_id varchar(100),
    pickup_datetime varchar(100),
    payment_type varchar(100),
    fare_amount varchar(100),
    surcharge varchar(100),	
    mta_tax	varchar(100),
    tip_amount varchar(100),
    tolls_amount varchar(100),	
    total_amount varchar(100)
)
WITH (DATA_SOURCE = mysample, LOCATION = N'*.csv',FILE_FORMAT = textdelimited)
GO

SELECT * FROM nyc.tripfare
